Package edge.helper

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EdgeUploader
    A simple interface which will be used in the future to build flexible upload engines (FTP, SCP, Dropbox for example).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseBootstrap
    fills the database with test stuff.
    EdgeError
    This class is used to report error messages to the user while also logging errors to a log file named "edge-pmt.log".
    EdgeFTP
    Interface implementation of the EdgeUploader class.
    EdgeLogger
    The EdgeLogger provides a neat interface to collect log data.
    EdgeMailer
    EdgeMailer is used to send mails to any email address.
    EdgeSession
    This (yet) simple class is used to store a reference of the current logged in user. the interface is completely static.
    EdgeTemplate  
    EdgeTextField
    We're sub-classing TextField & PasswordField to add custom error/success states to any of those fields.
    EdgeTransferListener
    Reports the upload process to the caller.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EdgeState
    This enum represents every known state a field can have.
